ayah: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَنۡ أَنذِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: inna arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi an andhir qawmaka min qabli an yatiyahum adhabun alimun
ayah_english: Indeed, We [We] sent Nuh to his people that Warn your people from before [that] comes to them a punishment painful

ayah_translit: qala yaqawmi inni lakum nadhirun mubinun
ayah_english: He said O my people! Indeed I am to you a warner clear

ayah: أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayah_translit: ani u'budu al-laha wa-ittaquhu wa-ati'uni
ayah_english: That Worship Allah and fear Him and obey me

ayah: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: yaghfir lakum min dhunubikum wayu-akhir'kum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala al-lahi idha jaa la yu-akharu law kuntum ta'lamuna
ayah_english: He will forgive for you [of] your sins and give you respite for a term specified Indeed (the) term (of) Allah when it comes not is delayed if you know

ayah: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

ayah: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَلُوٓاْ أَصَٰبِعَهُمۡ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَٱسۡتَغۡشَوۡاْ ثِيَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّواْ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ ٱسۡتِكۡبَارٗا
ayah_translit: wa-inni kullama da'awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja'alu asabi'ahum fi adhanihim wa-is'taghshaw thiyabahum wa-asarru wa-is'takbaru is'tik'baran
ayah_english: And indeed I every time I invited them that You may forgive them they put their fingers in their ears and covered themselves (with) their garments and persisted and were arrogant (with) pride

ayah_english: Then indeed I announced to them and I confided to them secretly

ayah: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا
ayah_translit: faqul'tu is'taghfiru rabbakum innahu kana ghaffaran
ayah_english: Then I said Ask forgiveness (from) your Lord Indeed He is Oft-Forgiving

ayah: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
ayah_translit: qala nuhun rabbi innahum asawni wa-ittaba'u man lam yazid'hu maluhu wawaladuhu illa khasaran
ayah_english: Said Nuh My Lord! Indeed they disobeyed me and followed (the one) who (did) not increase him his wealth and his children except (in) loss

ayah_translit: wamakaru makran kubbaran
ayah_english: And they have planned a plan great

ayah: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا كُبَّارٗا
ayah_translit: wamakaru makran kubbaran
ayah_english: And they have planned a plan great

ayah: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا كُبَّارٗا
ayah_translit: wamakaru makran kubbaran
ayah_english: And they have planned a plan great

ayah: وَقَالُواْ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدّٗا وَلَا سُوَاعٗا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرٗا
ayah_translit: waqalu la tadharunna alihatakum wala tadharunna waddan wala suwa'an wala yaghutha waya'uqa wanasran
ayah_english: And they said (Do) not leave your gods and (do) not leave Wadd and not Suwa and not Yaguth and Yauq and Nasr

ayah: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا
ayah_translit: waqad adallu kathiran wala tazidi al-zalimina illa dalalan
ayah_english: And indeed they have led astray many And not increase the wrongdoers except (in) error

ayah: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا
ayah_translit: mimma khatiatihim ugh'riqu fa-ud'khilu naran falam yajidu lahum min duni al-lahi ansaran
ayah_english: Because of their sins they were drowned then made to enter (the) Fire and not they found for themselves from besides Allah any helpers

ayah: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا

ayah: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
ayah_translit: waqala nuhun rabbi la tadhar ala al-ardi mina al-kafirina dayyaran
ayah_english: And said Nuh My Lord! (Do) not leave on the earth any (of) the disbelievers (as) an inhabitant

ayah: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا
ayah_translit: innaka in tadharhum yudillu ibadaka wala yalidu illa fajiran kaffaran
ayah_english: Indeed You if You leave them they will mislead Your slaves and not they will beget except a wicked a disbeliever

ayah: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيۡتِيَ مُؤۡمِنٗا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا
ayah_translit: rabbi igh'fir li waliwalidayya waliman dakhala baytiya mu'minan walil'mu'minina wal-mu'minati wala tazidi al-zalimina illa tabaran
ayah_english: My Lord! Forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and believing men and believing women And (do) not increase the wrongdoers except (in) destruction

ayah_translit: rabbi igh'fir li waliwalidayya waliman dakhala baytiya mu'minan walil'mu'minina wal-mu'minati wala tazidi al-zalimina illa tabaran
ayah_english: My Lord! Forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and believing men and believing women And (do) not increase the wrongdoers except (in) destruction
